pages.text: The $(l:https://github.com/Kay9Unit/Dragon-Mounts-Legacy/wiki)Dragon Mounts: Legacy wiki$(/l) shows Eggs & Hatching, Taming & Raising, and Healing & Riding.$(br2)I was unable to find a valid invite for their discord server.$(br2)$(l:https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/dragon-mounts-legacy)Curseforge page$(/l)
